entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a way to delete symbols with native AOT #89686
  • JIT produces different asm from IL emit than from source #89685
  • Add `DOTNET_JitStdOutDirectory` to separate JitDisasm/JitDump outputs #89683
    Future
  • NativeAOT Windows - System.InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid #89672
  • [browser] V8 System.Text.Json.Tests AOT assert - loader.c:1821, condition not met #89670
    8.0.0
  • Pause timers on debug pause #89669
  • [API Proposal]: Ability to convert ValueTask<T> to ValueTask #89667
  • Span<byte> from local variable bug in .net 7.x Release #89666
    8.0.0
  • Failure in Mono run of System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #89661

Closed

  • `PublishAot` should have better error messages when cross-compiling #88942
    8.0.0
  • [QUESTION] How to reboot the system when computer is locked? #89677
  • HttpListener.Getcontext() not working on linux. #89671
  • ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics uses AttachCurrentThread #89649
  • [wasm][node] Test failures on System.Net.Http.Functional #86326
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: superpmi-collect consistently fails to fully collect crossgen2 scenarios #88423
    8.0.0
  • StreamReader.Peek() on a DeflateStream returns -1 early #68983
    8.0.0
  • SqlServer.Types regressed on .NET 7 #75455
    8.0.0
  • msbuild segfault on arm64 linux package restore #76039
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent failure in CriticalFinalizer test #76041
    8.0.0
  • Cloud Native: Improve Startup and workingset for Trimmed WebApp #80388
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [browser] fix loading assets #89687
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary assignments of `MSBuildAllProjects`. #89684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use cgroup to calculate available memory #89682
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DAC GetFlags() function for SOS #89679
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update gcinfo for arm64 mrs instruction #89678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove active issue 77334 #89676
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi collect asyncio fix #89663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bugfix/27769 fix invalid output of readonlysequence tryget #89662
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Rename UnrollEqualsStartsWIth to UnrollEqualsStartsWith #89656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [7.0 port] #89053
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.21
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable new analyzer CA1868: 'Unnecessary call to 'Contains' for sets' and fix findings #89652
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable MacCatalyst too in PalCreateDump.cpp #89665
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nodejs][http] remove active issue 86326 #89588
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove _isBlocked constraint from StreamReader.Peek() #89609
    area-System.IO
  • Use new name of the ignorelist switch. #89643
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Optimize some Vector usage patterns in morph #89506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle managed exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2232021 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop and use computed substring set #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement `System.Linq.Expressions` substitutions according to the recent refactoring #89638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix Windows static build to not export MONO_API symbols. #89642
    area-Build-mono
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] CI: Don't run chrome debugger tests on runtime-wasm if they #89658
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Gather optimization info through the DAC #89534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run --project issue #34331
  • CreateNewImage task fails - Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers DN8.P6; Required 'Entrypoint' items were not set. #34329

PullRequests

Created

  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Area-Containers
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "Replace/original and code generation extensions" #107
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create spec for lambda params with by-ref modifiers without type name #7369

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve handling of CS8974 #69286

PullRequests

Created

  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • use void instead of exception when not returning a exception but only throwing it #69287
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Preserve formatting when converting array-expressions to collection-expressions. #69278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to update expressions like `Array.Empty<T>()` over to using the `[]` collection expression. #69279
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • opting out from taghelpers with the bang `!` doesn't work as expected when css isolation is involved. #49728
  • My Source Code Are Not Private In Webassembly Blazor #49726
  • Kestrel should disallow trailers cited in rfc7230 section 4.1.2 #49725
  • border property for img not working on chrome browser #49724
  • Add flexibility to AddStackExchangeRedisCache by removing setupAction #49721
  • Identity endpoints break clients generated from Open API #49720
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49719
  • In SignalR, allow strongly typed hubs to return `void` not `Task` #49717

PullRequests

Created

  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF/CR/LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Clean up some code in ANCM #49718
    area-runtime
  • Fix Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces references #49716
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2232000 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory leaks on latest .NET 8 preview with Windows #16436
  • Binding to HeightRequest not working properly #16435
  • Invalid URI: The Uri string is too long. - NET MAUI #16434
  • Navigation bar background color bug when navigating in a specific manner #16433
  • Span doesn't have a StyleClass property #16432
  • Label TextColor does not update on theme change when using FormattedText #16431
  • SetAppThemeColor for Label or Entry background colours only works on initial state on release builds #16430
  • Entry Control does not accepting numeric inputs when Android language set to Arabic #16429
  • IsClippedToBounds Property is not working for Android, MAC and IOS. #16428
  • Binding to object is null #16425

Closed

  • Application crashes when not in debug mode, possible release mode bug #16359

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures

Merged

  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • [ci] Sign unsigned .net 8 preview 7 files #16422

Updated

  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • underlying sql log #31375
  • Consider switching to reference-based value comparer when a primitive collection is immutable/read-only #31374

Closed

  • How to use ExecuteUpdate for update from ExpandoObject #31367
  • When Trying Get Close Relations #31352
  • Conversion of int[] array with array.Contains(int value) causes Exception|Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Incorrect syntax near '$'. #31371
